caseStudies.title: Leading Global Lifestyle Distribution Company Successfully Implements .NET Based Dealer Management System

client.name: American Watch and Lifestyle Distribution Company

customerBrief.description: The Customer is a leading American watch and lifestyle distribution organization which deals in high quality watches, bags, and jewellery. In India, it operates under both Company Owned Company Operated (COCO) and Franchisee Owned Franchisee Operated (FOFO) models.

businessCase.description: The organization has dealers across PAN India, and the salespersons were required to visit dealers in person to gather registration details. The entire process was manual, leading to high turnaround times, and multiple back-office applications were used without a clear control on user access.

challenges.description: The COVID-19 pandemic introduced major challenges, forcing the entire project to be managed remotely. Despite these obstacles, the team successfully controlled all activities offshore. The project was executed using GITL's phased methodology including Analysis, Design, Conference Room Pilot (CRP), Development, NAV Integration, Training, UAT, Go-Live, and post Go-live support.
keyChallenges: High turnaround times for dealer registration
Lack of control over user access
Multiple back-office applications for replenishment and order processing

solution.description: Dealer Management Desk was a priority project for the company, and they had high expectations. Godrej Infotech Ltd. was selected for their consulting approach and TO-BE solution.
features: Real-time integration with Microsoft Dynamics NAV and parent organization database
Applications hosted on Azure Cloud, managed by GITL
System used by 1000 dealers and 1300 users
solution.postImplementation: GITL continues to provide annual maintenance services for the system.

benefits.description: The solution provided various benefits that streamlined dealer management and improved business processes.
list: Online dealer onboarding and order processing without in-person visits
Automatic stock replenishment via business rules
Increased revenue due to enhanced stock replenishment orders

meta.title: Case Study: Leading Global Lifestyle Distribution Company - .NET Dealer Management System
meta.description: Discover how a leading American watch and lifestyle distribution company implemented a .NET-based Dealer Management System for seamless dealer onboarding, order management, and more.

caseStudies.title: Global E-commerce Giant Implements AI-Powered Recommendation Engine

customerBrief.description: The customer is a leading global e-commerce platform offering a wide range of products to millions of customers worldwide. They aim to enhance user experience by providing personalized product recommendations.

businessCase.description: With a massive product catalog and diverse user base, the customer wanted to implement an AI-based recommendation engine to boost user engagement and conversion rates. The previous recommendation system was rule-based and failed to capture personalized user preferences in real time.

challenges.description: The primary challenge was processing and analyzing vast amounts of data in real time to deliver personalized product recommendations. Additionally, integration with existing systems and ensuring scalability for millions of daily users were critical aspects.
keyChallenges: Maintaining high performance and low latency

solution.description: We implemented an AI-powered recommendation engine using advanced machine learning algorithms that provide personalized product suggestions. The solution is integrated with the e-commerce platform's existing infrastructure and scales automatically to handle increased user activity.
features: Scalable architecture supporting millions of users
solution.postImplementation: The client continues to see a steady increase in conversion rates and user engagement with the personalized recommendations.

benefits.description: The AI-powered solution provided significant business benefits, enhancing the user experience and driving sales growth.
list: Increased user engagement through personalized recommendations
Real-time product suggestions based on user behavior
Scalable solution capable of handling peak traffic

meta.title: Case Study: Global E-commerce Giant Implements AI-Powered Recommendation Engine
meta.description: Learn how a leading global e-commerce company leveraged an AI-powered recommendation engine to improve user experience and boost conversion rates.
